## ğŸ“¥ Installation Examples

### Complete Platform
```bash
npm install neural-trader
# Installs all 18 packages (~5 MB)
```

### Modular Installation
```bash
# Minimal setup
npm install @neural-trader/core @neural-trader/risk

# AI trading
npm install @neural-trader/neural @neural-trader/mcp @neural-trader/strategies

# Live trading
npm install @neural-trader/execution @neural-trader/brokers @neural-trader/market-data
```

### Test Installation
```bash
# Quick verification
npx neural-trader --version
# Expected: 1.0.2

npx neural-trader examples
# Lists available examples
```
